body:
I have a Unicode file (UTF-16 FFFE little-endian BOM) which contains rows of tab-separated fields.

Read [http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2308112/splitting-unicode-i-think-using-split-in-ruby](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2308112/splitting-unicode-i-think-using-split-in-ruby), I am going to use the Ruby split (file to lines, then line to fields).

BTW, what's the Unicode char for:
* LF
* CR
* Tab

Thanks!
title: Tab / LF / CR unicode character
